resources.string: Use your current location to find articles within 20km from where you are, or search for a place to find Wikivoyage articles
Select a place from the list below to view on the map:
No sights found, it\'s quiet here or there are districts to explore.

• Tap the Use Current Location button to find nearby Wikivoyage guides within a 20 km radius of where you are.
• Search for a location to view it in a map with nearby guides.
• Tap black pins to view the opening information from the Wikivoyage article on that place.
• There are two buttons, one to open the actual Wikivoyage article in your browser, and one to view the sights from that place on the map
• The green pins are for sights, click on one to see info about the sight.
• If you move the map around, use the Refresh button to reload articles around the map center.
